properties.entry:
org.apache.sling - Sling Node Package Manager: All-in-one deployment content package
By default this package is installed on Sling using Composum. The properties used are sling.host (default localhost) and sling.port (default 8080). The path of the Composum package manager is stored in packageManagerUri. To install it to AEM you can either use autoInstallAllAEM which uses the correct package manager path as well as aem.port (default 4502) and sling.host. Both are using sling.user and sling.password for the credeintials.
Please overwrite the properties as necessary with the -D option when installing the package.
